word: DURING THE PAST THIRTY-FIVE YEARS SHE HAS BEEN LABORING FOR THE CHURCH AND FOR THE WORLD, AND IN BEHALF OF THE BIBLE, THE COMMANDMENTS OF GOD, AND THE FAITH OF JESUS, SETTING FORTH PRACTICAL GODLINESS AS THE TRUE TEST OF CHRISTIAN CHARACTER. THE FRUITS OF HER TEACHINGS AND LABORS HAVE BEEN GOOD, AND ONLY GOOD. HERE IS THE LORD'S TEST:—
